channel.title: Trainingmontage — Web Dev & Writing
channel.description: I make cool things for the web and write about what I learn.

item.title: CS Basics: Converting Between Different Bases
item.description: Now that we've covered the basic numeral systems, it's time to learn how to convert from one to another.

item.title: CS Basics: Detour - Nibbles, MSB, and LSB
item.description: We're taking a quick detour to talk about an important concept when dealing with binary numbers — the Most Significant Bit, and the Least Significant Bit.

item.title: CS Basics: Hex and 32 bit Conversion
item.description: Once you have a handle on basic numeral systems like binary, it's time to move on to more complicated systems. We'll cover hexadecimal and 32 bit numbers in the second CS Basics post.

item.title: CS Basics: Binary Conversion
item.description: Understanding how to convert numbers to and from binary, or any numeric base, is a fundamental concept in programming and computer science. Let's get a grip on those fundamentals!
